== Oachira (CT) (628363) ==

Oachira (CT) is a town in the [[Karunagappally]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 13.29 sq. km. and harbouring 7494 households with total population of 28412 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 34 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 104 km. Male population is 13139 and female population is 15273. Scheduled Caste population is 2478 and Scheduled Tribes population is 132. Census Location Code of the town is 628363<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 34 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 104 km. Railway station is at Oachira at a distance of 0 km.
